p: In the second scheme, 3-(dimethylamino)-1-phenylprop-2-en-1-one 6 was heated under reflux with ethyl acetoacetate and NH 4OAc in glacial acetic acid to produce ethyl 2-methyl-6-phenylnicotinate 7 in which, the ester moiety was subjected to hydrazinolysis to produce the key intermediate 2-methyl-6-phenylnicotinohydrazide 8 which reacted with different N-substituted indoline-2,3-diones 4a–c to get target compounds 9a–c.
